Reviews.Title: Great drive for a very fussy TiVo's, just don't use it in a performance orientated  PC.
Reviews.Author: videobruce
Reviews.Content: I wish I had a dollar for every review on NewEgg from these kids that buy a 'green AV' drive for a PC, then complaint the performance is terrible when they try transferring and accessing files.Green drives that are specifically designed for AV use as in DVR's or Media Servers can't and won't have the speed and ability of a desktop drive. Rotational speeds are lower (not needed when recording or playing media) and the actuator arm is dampened to keep the drive quiet (necessary for many, but not all DVR's, especially TiVo's).Power consumption is measurably lower compared with a regular desktop drive (the blue series).Note; some DVR's won't accept drives larger than 1TB and some won't work with caches larger than 32MB
